data.message:
My account was disabled. It will be three days today 
I did not break the any rols 
I have a lot of pressure Today, three days i'm no eating , I have the last messages of my love in this account, he not in this world.
I request to return my account,
. please forgive me my any mistake thanks. 😭😭😪🤧🤧

replies.message: Hi Saira. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2uZKJ7a. If you think you may have been disabled by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2sYyoP6.  -Ashley
Facebook There will be four days of appeal. Not yet replied
